thread.title: Listen To Lady Gaga's Impressive Super Bowl Halftime Show Mic Feed
thread.title_full: Listen To Lady Gaga's Impressive Super Bowl Halftime Show Mic Feed

title: Listen To Lady Gaga's Impressive Super Bowl Halftime Show Mic Feed
text:
Listen To Lady Gaga's Impressive Super Bowl Halftime Show Mic Feed posted by James Dinh - 
Most folks can agree that Lady Gaga delivered a strong vocal performance during her Super Bowl LI halftime show, but if you had anything hesitation, take a listen to the pop titan's recently released mic feed from the pop extravaganza. { "position1" : { "type" : "artist", "id" : 39335, "name" : "Lady Gaga" } } 
In the video, the Lady's vocals are isolated from the music and most of the crowd chaos, leaving her live vocals from the 13-minute performance available in crystal clear sound. Despite having the backing track do some of the work as she performed choreography during certain song hooks, Monster Monster churned out a rather impressive output for such a high-energy routine. 
Among some of the songs featured during the spectacular included her career-defining hits like "Poker Face ," " Just Dance," "Telephone ," " Born This Way" and, of course, "Bad Romance." Take a listen below! 
Photo: Getty Images
